definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
to donate blood/also written 供血

sentences.english: A donation makes the cat cluck like a chicken.
sentences.chinese: 捐一笔钱便能让这只猫像鸡那样的咯咯叫。

sentences.english: If someone was donating money, Bhagavan would spend hours with that person.
sentences.chinese: 假如有人捐了钱，巴关会花几个小时与那团体在一同。

sentences.english: He contributed a large amount of money to various charity organisations and hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 他捐很多钱给慈善机构和医院。

sentences.english: I would not consider such a family, as you described, a deserving of Zakat Al-Fitr or of Zakat Al-Mal.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为你所说的这样的家庭应当开斋捐或者天课。

sentences.english: Rich and generous, he contributed two million dollars to the Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 因为有钱又慷慨，他捐了两百万圆给红十字会。

sentences.english: It is everybody's responsibility to give. If everyone gives one yuan every month, it will add up to billions of dollars."(3)
sentences.chinese: 若每个人一个月捐一元钱，那将会积成数十亿美元。

sentences.english: If you no longer fit an item , donate it.
sentences.chinese: 假如那件衣服你再也穿不了了，捐了它。

sentences.english: Certificate issuance of tax deduction or exemption proofs.
sentences.chinese: 一三关于减免税捐相关证明之核发事项。

sentences.english: They have subscribed large sums to the fund.
sentences.chinese: 他们向基金会捐了巨款。

sentences.english: I should beg alms of them for my poor.
sentences.chinese: 我就请他们捐几文给我的穷人们。

sentences.english: I chipped in to lend a helping hand for that poor girl.
sentences.chinese: 我捐了一些钱，想帮帮那个可怜的女孩。

sentences.english: One day, someone donated a pair of eyes to her.
sentences.chinese: 一天，有人捐了一对眼精给她。

sentences.english: I’ve just donated $400 in unrestricted funds to MSF.
sentences.chinese: 我刚刚向MSF的“无限定基金”捐了400美元。

sentences.english: All Management Committee Members serve on a voluntary basis and the Association is funded by membership fees or through fundraising events.
sentences.chinese: 全部理事皆为义务性质，经费来源是会员年捐。

sentences.english: Weeks later, etc, were donated to banishment jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 周后等悉捐珠宝，资充军需。

sentences.english: She was declared brain-dead, and my wife and I donated her organs.
sentences.chinese: 她被宣布脑死亡后，我和妻子把她的器官捐了出去。

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money/to give generously to charity
lit. to loosen one's purse/fig. to give generously to help others
